summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding the preservation of a July 23 video in the Epstein case, indicating that certain emails about the video's preservation are being withheld under a legal exemption (Noel). The email includes an attachment of related documents.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, communicating about withholding emails related to the preservation of a July 23 video under the Noel exemption.

keyFacts: There is a July 23 video that is subject to preservation efforts in the Epstein case.
Emails regarding the preservation of this video are being withheld in full under the Noel exemption.
The communication is from an Assistant United States Attorney, indicating ongoing legal and FOIA-related handling of case materials.
